oracle.sdoapi.geom
Interface Polygon

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, CurvePolygon, Geometry, java.io.Serializable, Surface
public interface Polygon
extends CurvePolygon

Polygon is an interface that represents an OGC linear polygon, which is a planar surface defined by one exterior boundary (exterior ring) and zero or more interior boundaries (interior rings or holes).

Methods inherited from interface oracle.sdoapi.geom.CurvePolygon
getExteriorRing, getInteriorRingArray, getInteriorRings, getNumRings, getRingArray, getRingAt, getRings
